name: PlaygroundBluetoothConnectionView.State
desc: The states that tell users how to proceed when connecting to and switching between peripherals in a playground page.

items.name: case connecting
items.desc: The peripheral is in the process of connecting to a connection view’s central manager.

items.name: case noConnection
items.desc: The connection to a peripheral has been lost.

items.name: case searchingForPeripherals
items.desc: A connection view’s central manager is scanning for nearby peripherals.

items.name: case selectingPeripherals
items.desc: One or more peripherals have been discovered and can be selected.

items.name: case connectedPeripheralFirmwareOutOfDate
items.desc: The currently connected peripheral has outdated firmware and can't be used.

items.name: static func != (PlaygroundBluetoothConnectionView.State, PlaygroundBluetoothConnectionView.State) -> Bool
items.desc: Compares two connection states and returns true if they're different.
